sect1.title: Introduction to Manual
sect1.simpara: This manual is split into two main parts, the first part is the User Guide. This details the various ideas behind creating a Graphical User Interface(GUI), including using Signals and Widgets. The second part is the Reference, this part of the manual details each of the objects and their indiviual methods that can be used with them as well as examples.

sect1.title: About the Manual
sect1.para: This manual is written using a modified version of the Docbook DTD. The modifications which have been made allow the documentation of the object system that PHP-GTK uses. The XML for each of the classes and their methods. The XML Generator was written by &link.andrei;, the original author of PHP-GTK itself. The documentation is transformed from its XML source into various other formats using XSL as well as a host of other tools, the manual build system was created by, and is maintained by &link.jmoore;.
The manual is avaible in various formats all of which are downloadable from the PHP-GTK website.
